title: Mont Blanc Co. Logo
content:
This may be custom, but does anyone know what type face it is based on?

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018055402im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2508_3847.gif)
author: user_1969

comments.content:
Why does it have to be based upon something? - it could actually be (and probably is) an ORIGINAL DESIGN.

Nick Cooke

For something similar, try [Relay](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018055402/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Relay/styles) or [Recovery](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018055402/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50269) (aka Eagle).  
F

Mmmm... Recovery is very nice, much better than the Mont Blanc logo which is a bit thin in the O, T and C.

Nick Cooke
